Unicron/Teufel:



Unicron avoided the fusion blast from the Maximal, but he was struck by other 
shots that dug into his armor.  He turned in anger, firing off a burst of 
green flames at Hot Rod.

---

Teufel watched as two missiles heading for him exploded.  With added momentum 
from still moving he jets hard left, a few shots digging deep into his 
relatively weak frame.  He begins making intense scans on Unicron while still 
fighting.

His shoulder cannons fire twenty rapid laser bolts each, forty heading 
towards Zardus.  The left launcher on his arm fired off two missiles at the 
Cybertronian Fire.
